ComicInfo.Title: Fountain of Fear; The Black Candle; The Coin of Evil; The Prophecy; Aria in Blood; The Man They Could Not Hang; The Wig; The Mask of Graffenwehr
ComicInfo.Summary:
An escaped convict finds the fountain of youth. He tries to change his appearance by getting younger, but vengeful Indian spirits won't let him leave the fountain.
The witch Mortella fabricates a black candle, meant to bring death to her pious neighbor.
Weird facts.
Three wishes come true by the magic of a beggar's coin. But there's a horrible price to pay.
Carlotta sees death in the cards for thief Chuck Hanson. He kills Carlotta and is doomed to die by water. He does so after weeks on the run.
An attempt to get the lead role in an opera goes terribly wrong.
Sam Johns is sentenced to hang for a crime he didn't commit, but the trap on the scaffold refuses to open when he is about to be hung.
A barber kills a man and steals his hair for a wig, but the wig seeks revenge.
Tamis Kahn gazes into the face of a woman he killed earlier in the day.
